title: BitMine’s $358 Million Ethereum Haul: Fueling ETH’s Wall Street Surge
description: Ethereum Emerges as Wall Street’s Crypto Darling Ethereum (CRYPTO:ETH) has earned the moniker “Wall Street Token” from prominent money manager Jan Van Eck, CEO of Van Eck Funds, in a recent Fox Business interview. The cryptocurrency is witnessing surging inflows while Bitcoin (CRYPTO:BTC) faces capital outflows. This shift underscores Ethereum’s growing appeal among institutional investors, with its […]The post BitMine’s $358 Million Ethereum Haul: Fueling ETH’s Wall Street Surge appeared first on 24/7 Wall St..

title: Nasdaq Ramps Up Scrutiny on Crypto Buys to Prevent Stock Inflation
description: Nasdaq is ramping up scrutiny of listed companies aggressively buying cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin to fund holdings, aiming to prevent artificial stock price inflation without core business improvements. This includes delaying approvals and demanding disclosures, potentially tempering crypto enthusiasm and promoting sustainable integration.
